publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: Liezi was living in Butian, the game preserve of the state of Zheng.

sense.def: dwell in for longish time LY 15 居是邦 "when living in such-and-such a state"

tls:text.tls:line: For forty years no one noticed him,

sense.def: recognise the identity of the contextually determinate person N

tls:text.tls:line: and the prince, the nobles and the high officials of the state

sense.def: the ruler of the state

tls:text.tls:line: and the prince, the nobles and the high officials of the state

sense.def: take the view that S obtains, take the view that S is true

tls:text.tls:line: regarded him as one of the common people.

sense.def: commoner;

tls:text.tls:line: There was famine in Zheng,

sense.def: there was famine

tls:text.tls:line: There was famine in Zheng,

sense.def: be insufficient; suffer insufficiency of resources; suffer famine

tls:text.tls:line: Birth and change, [It gives birth to itself, it transforms itself;

sense.def: give birth to (oneself)

tls:text.tls:line: Birth and change, [It gives birth to itself, it transforms itself;

sense.def: change (one's own) essence, change (oneself) essentially

tls:text.tls:line: shape and coulour, [it gives shape to itself, and it gives colour to itself;

sense.def: cause to have shape

tls:text.tls:line: shape and coulour, [it gives shape to itself, and it gives colour to itself;

sense.def: cause (oneself) to have colour

tls:text.tls:line: wisdom and strength, [it gives wisdom to itself, and it gives strength to itself,

sense.def: cause (oneself) to be intelligent

tls:text.tls:line: wisdom and strength, [it gives wisdom to itself, and it gives strength to itself,

sense.def: cause (oneself) to be constitutionally (not just temporarily) strong

tls:text.tls:line: decrease and growth. [it causes itself to decrease and it causes itself to flourish.

sense.def: cause (oneself) to wither>decline

tls:text.tls:line: earth which shapes and supports cannot teach and reform,

sense.def: conduct education; engage in the teaching of Buddhism

tls:text.tls:line: the sage who teaches and reforms cannot make things act counter to their functions,

sense.def: conduct education; engage in the teaching of Buddhism

tls:text.tls:line: is it we who are truly happy?

sense.def: rejoice; be happy in the company of others; be on cheerfully friendly terms with each other, be delighted; enjoy oneself, be in high spirits

tls:text.tls:line: old age,

sense.def: decrepitude of old age

tls:text.tls:line: When he is old,

sense.def: decrepitude of old age

tls:text.tls:line: singing as he strummed a lute.

sense.def: sing a melody, sing a song, sing along (should this be vt[oN]???) often to accompaniment on the lute

seg.line: 亦有何樂而拾穗行歌乎？」

tls:text.tls:srcline: 亦有何樂而拾穗行歌乎？」
tls:text.tls:line: 'The reasons for my happiness,

sense.def: deep communicative happiness 熱鬧的快樂

tls:text.tls:line: that I have been able to live so long.

sense.def: like N

tls:text.tls:line: that I can be so happy.'

sense.def: find communicative happiness; be communicatively happy (the optative cases have to be moved!)

tls:text.tls:line: that I can be so happy.'

sense.def: like N

tls:text.tls:line: The gentleman finds rest in it,

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:text.tls:line: the mean man submits to it!'

sense.def: petty person

tls:text.tls:line: The good find rest in it,

sense.def: abstractly: "the benevolent person; the human-hearted person" at any time and in any place

tls:text.tls:line: the wicked submit to it.'

sense.def: abstractly: "the cruel people" (in any place and at any time)

tls:text.tls:line: what sort of a man is he?

sense.def: be what kind of person? be who?

tls:text.tls:line: Both of these

sense.def: 此三者

tls:text.tls:line: that he forgot to eat and sleep.

sense.def: resting; going to rest

tls:text.tls:line: 'If heaven really is accumulated air,

sense.def: dynamic substrate of the universe

tls:text.tls:line: are air which shines inside the accumulated air.

sense.def: dynamic substrate of the universe

tls:text.tls:line: The man was satisfied and greatly cheered;

sense.def: be overjoyed; be absolutely delighted

tls:text.tls:line: and so was the man who enlightened him.

sense.def: be overjoyed; be absolutely delighted

tls:text.tls:line: heaven and earth lend them to you to cast off from your body as an insect sheds its skin.

sense.def: metamorphosis, complete transformation

tls:text.tls:line: Xiang was delighted;

sense.def: be overjoyed; be absolutely delighted

tls:text.tls:line: Guo said.

sense.def: ah! exclamatory particle expressing surprise, sometimes mixed with delight

tls:text.tls:line: for crops and seed, clay and wood, birds and animals, fish and turtles,

sense.def: grain

tls:text.tls:line: and his dulled senses more stupefied.

sense.def: feelings 六情

tls:text.tls:line: 'Deep is my error!

sense.def: my, the modification being marked by 之

tls:text.tls:line: left the Imperial chambers,

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:text.tls:line: Falling asleep in the daytime,

sense.def: take a rest; go to rest; go to sleep

tls:text.tls:line: Falling asleep in the daytime,

sense.def: fall asleep

tls:text.tls:line: who knows how many thousands and myriads of miles from the Middle Kingdom.

sense.def: this (concrete N) 斯子"this son"; often collective: 斯民 "these people", and never identifying: "this people"

tls:text.tls:line: all things follow their natural course.

sense.def: be so of and by itself; be naturally oneself; be natural; come naturally

tls:text.tls:line: all men follow their natural course;

sense.def: naturally ensue; emerge naturally, happen naturally, unprovoked by human or superhuman action of any kind

tls:text.tls:line: he was delighted to have found himself.

sense.def: happily; contentedly; in good spirits

tls:text.tls:line: 'I have lived undisturbed for three months,

sense.def: auto-honorific ceremonial (by the decision of Qín Shǐhúang, used by emperors only)

tls:text.tls:line: and meditating a way to care for myself and govern others,

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:text.tls:line: I know it,

sense.def: auto-honorific ceremonial (by the decision of Qín Shǐhúang, used by emperors only)
auto-honorific ceremonial (by the decision of Qín Shǐhúang, used by emperors only)

tls:text.tls:line: for more than two hundred years.

sense.def: discontinue one's current activity; be disrupted

tls:text.tls:line: yet the eager and diligent act as his messengers.

sense.def: be trusty; be guileless

tls:text.tls:line: Yin Sheng was deeply ashamed,

sense.def: feel ashamed, be visibly embarrased; show scruples 甚怍 慎子：楚王大怍

tls:text.tls:line: held his breath for a long time,

sense.def: block off (e.g. hold one's breath)

tls:text.tls:line: held his breath for a long time,

sense.def: breath

tls:text.tls:line: held his breath for a long time,

sense.def: for a long time [or: VPi.postS, but this seems artificial, though logically possible.]

tls:text.tls:line: held his breath for a long time,

sense.def: very

tls:text.tls:line: May I ask how he achieved this?'

sense.def: may I ask

tls:text.tls:line: who gets his integrity from wine,

sense.def: even also; even (猶。。。何況）

tls:text.tls:line: In the middle of the night

sense.def: mid-

tls:text.tls:line: Zihua's retainers, who were all of noble blood,

sense.def: disciples

tls:text.tls:line: But Shangqiu Kai thought he was serious

sense.def: reliably, really 信然

tls:text.tls:line: But Shangqiu Kai thought he was serious

sense.def: be the case; be right (of a proposition); sometimes: be conceivable 甚然"this is very much so"

seg.line: 子華昉令豫肉食衣帛之次。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 子華昉令豫肉食衣帛之次。
tls:text.tls:line: and Zihua granted him an allowance of meat and silk with the others.

sense.def: aiming for meat, having meat as an object

tls:text.tls:line: 'Even in my own heart

sense.def: my

tls:text.tls:line: I feared only that I might fall short in believing and acting on it.

sense.def: [I] only fear that S; [one] only fears that S

tls:text.tls:line: I forgot where my body was going,

sense.def: one's body (also: body of the deceased; even overall physical shape of Heaven and earth) 人形體 "human body"

seg.line: 范氏門徒路遇乞兒馬醫，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 范氏門徒路遇乞兒馬醫，
tls:text.tls:line: when Zihua's retainers met a begger or a horse-doctor on the road,

sense.def: disciples

tls:text.tls:line: and how much less when others are as sincere as oneself!

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself (as opposed to other things) 自我 (cf. 自我加冕 "be self-congratulatory)

tls:text.tls:line: and when they sleep in my yard,

sense.def: unfathomable; endless (mountains etc)

tls:text.tls:line: May I ask whether you have a Way to tread im water?'

sense.def: may I ask

tls:text.tls:line: as easily as though he were picking them up off the ground.

sense.def: pluck (herbs etc); pluck up (deftly and with ease, like a thief), lift

tls:text.tls:line: it will be like picking them off the ground.

sense.def: pluck (herbs etc); pluck up (deftly and with ease, like a thief), lift

tls:text.tls:line: 'What sort of man was that?'

sense.def: be what kind of person? be who?

tls:text.tls:line: 'Alas!

sense.def: ah! exclamatory particle expressing surprise, sometimes mixed with delight

tls:text.tls:line: with the tears soaking the lapels of his coat,

sense.def: tears

tls:text.tls:line: Unknowing who and what we were. //

sense.def: who?

tls:text.tls:line: but turned back half way.

sense.def: half, mid-

tls:text.tls:line: 'If that is all, why should you be alarmed?'
If men with so little to gain from me value me so highly as a customer,

sense.def: even also; even (猶。。。何況）

tls:text.tls:line: Laozi stood in the middle of the road with his eyes raised to heaven and sighed.

sense.def: throw one's head back and V; throw one's head back and look at the sky

tls:text.tls:line: he crawled on his knees into Laozi's presence and said:

sense.def: on one's knees

tls:text.tls:line: 'Master, just now you looked up at heaven and sighed

sense.def: throw one's head back and V; throw one's head back and look at the sky

tls:text.tls:line: I should tike to ask what I have done wrong.'

sense.def: may I ask about the abstract subject N

tls:text.tls:line: the landlord's wife his towel and comb;

sense.def: towel

tls:text.tls:line: the landlord's wife his towel and comb;

sense.def: SHI: comb

tls:text.tls:line: he beat the stone chimes

sense.def: knock against (mostly drums but also bells) so as to produce a sound; knock (at a gate)

tls:text.tls:line: he beat the stone chimes

sense.def: slap, tap; knock together

tls:text.tls:line: he performed the nine parts of the Xiao-shao music

sense.def: stanza, complete part; full round of a tune

seg.line: 禽獸之智有自然與人童者，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 禽獸之智有自然與人童者，
tls:text.tls:line: There are ways in which the intelligence of beasts and birds is by the nature similar to man's.

sense.def: naturally; all by itself, all of itself; unprovoked; effortlessly

tls:text.tls:line: joyfully desire to love and benefit you.

sense.def: be happy

tls:text.tls:line: he lodged him in the royal chambers,

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

seg.line: 予一人不盈于德而諧於樂。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 予一人不盈于德而諧於樂。
tls:text.tls:line: I, who am King, have neglected virtue for pleasure.

sense.def: I, the one person (the king)

tls:text.tls:line: are displaced and replaced by a comprehension of numbers and understanding of change,

sense.def: change character, get changed

tls:text.tls:line: that it becomes worthwhile to study magic with you.

sense.def: begin to V after S> only then, then for the first time

tls:text.tls:line: When you go to sleep lying on your belt,

sense.def: fall asleep

tls:text.tls:line: Hence by day we imagine and by night dream

sense.def: imagine things

tls:text.tls:line: that the True Men of old

sense.def: forget oneself

tls:text.tls:line: forgot themselves when awake

sense.def: go to bed; go to bedroom for rest or sleep in a horizontal position; go to bed; spend the night; be asleep

tls:text.tls:line: is past telling and counting.

sense.def: be weighed and counted > be assessed be calculated

tls:text.tls:line: scolded and beaten

sense.def: be beaten with a stick

tls:text.tls:line: scolded and beaten

sense.def: be beaten

tls:text.tls:line: 'Alas!

sense.def: ah! exclamatory particle expressing surprise, sometimes mixed with delight

tls:text.tls:line: But my arts have been passed down secretly through the generations,

sense.def: my

tls:text.tls:line: The authorities of Song arrested him and wanted to know the reason.

sense.def: in Annals cancellary style: (unidentified) patricians of Npl; the leadership of Npl; often: an (unidentified) representative of Npl; representatives of Npl, sometimes military: the (military) men from Npl, the forces of Npl

tls:text.tls:line: The authorities of Song arrested him and wanted to know the reason.

sense.def: reason, grounds

tls:text.tls:line: I am not even sure that these words of mine are not abnormal,

sense.def: my

tls:text.tls:line: Yen Hui sang plucking the lute.

sense.def: sing a melody, sing a song, sing along (should this be vt[oN]???) often to accompaniment on the lute

tls:text.tls:line: neither eating nor sleeping,

sense.def: take a rest; go to rest; go to sleep

tls:text.tls:line: When the Marquis of Lu heard of this sage

sense.def: Marquis of N 齊侯

tls:text.tls:line: and Marquis asked in the humblest language to be allowed to question him.

sense.def: Marquis of N 齊侯
Marquis of N 齊侯

tls:text.tls:line: The Marquis of Lu was delighted.

sense.def: Marquis of N 齊侯

tls:text.tls:line: 'Then who do you think is a sage?'

sense.def: which one

tls:text.tls:line: there is a sage.

sense.def: a sage (unidentified)

tls:text.tls:line: does not speak, yet is trusted spontaneously;

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:text.tls:line: does not reform, yet his influence prevails spontaneously.

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:text.tls:line: or not.'

sense.def: really

tls:text.tls:line: or not.'

sense.def: be extraordinarily talented; be of superior or supreme intelligence; be sage-like; be a sage

tls:text.tls:line: The chief minister thought silently in his heart:

sense.def: consider (in one's mind) that, reckon that

tls:text.tls:line: 'What sort of man is Yen Hui?'

sense.def: natural disposition; personality, personal nature (not countable)趙歧2B6:孟子不悅其為人.

tls:text.tls:line: look out at my own neighbourhood

sense.def: my

tls:text.tls:line: have dealings with my kindred and friends,

sense.def: cultivate good relations (with somebody); interact (with somebody)

tls:text.tls:line: have dealings with my kindred and friends,

sense.def: blood relation, blood relations.

tls:text.tls:line: control my servants.

sense.def: menial servant

tls:text.tls:line: 'Hmm.

sense.def: ah! exclamatory particle expressing surprise, sometimes mixed with delight

tls:text.tls:line: Yang Zhu looked towards his gate and sang.

sense.def: sing a melody, sing a song, sing along (should this be vt[oN]???) often to accompaniment on the lute

tls:text.tls:line: But ordinary people sing

sense.def: menial government employee; menial servant; person of very low status (not necessarily adult)

tls:text.tls:line: when anyone is born

sense.def: menial government employee; menial servant; person of very low status (not necessarily adult)

tls:text.tls:line: 'My strong men,' said the King, looking displeased,

sense.def: my

tls:text.tls:line: He liked to go around with clever people,

sense.def: a worthy, any worthy; some worthies (with tensed predicate)

tls:text.tls:line: Gongsung Long is the kind of man

sense.def: natural disposition; personality, personal nature (not countable)趙歧2B6:孟子不悅其為人.

tls:text.tls:line: Then he took his leave saying:

sense.def: remain silent (not that this is not a state but an action to take), fall silent

tls:text.tls:line: Then he took his leave saying:

sense.def: for a long time [or: VPi.postS, but this seems artificial, though logically possible.]

tls:text.tls:line: Then he took his leave saying:

sense.def: very

tls:text.tls:line: and, because of what he had seen, abdicated the Empire.

sense.def: abdicate(also: 禪以天下)

tls:text.tls:line: I do not know.'

sense.def: auto-honorific ceremonial (by the decision of Qín Shǐhúang, used by emperors only)

tls:text.tls:line: How do I know this?...(3)

sense.def: auto-honorific ceremonial (by the decision of Qín Shǐhúang, used by emperors only)

tls:text.tls:line: There is no limit, but neither is there anything limitless;

sense.def: extreme limit; ultimate point

seg.line: 朕以是知其无極无盡也，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 朕以是知其无極无盡也，
tls:text.tls:line: That is why I know that they are limitless and exhaustible,

sense.def: auto-honorific ceremonial (by the decision of Qín Shǐhúang, used by emperors only)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 朕以是知其无極无盡也，
tls:text.tls:line: That is why I know that they are limitless and exhaustible,

sense.def: extreme limit; ultimate point

tls:text.tls:line: 'I travelled East as far as Ying;

sense.def: auto-honorific ceremonial (by the decision of Qín Shǐhúang, used by emperors only)

seg.line: 四荒、四極之外不異是也。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 四荒、四極之外不異是也。
tls:text.tls:line: This is how I know that the four seas, the four borderlands, the four limits, are no different from here.

sense.def: auto-honorific ceremonial (by the decision of Qín Shǐhúang, used by emperors only)

seg.line: 朕亦焉知天地之表不有大天地者乎？

tls:text.tls:srcline: 朕亦焉知天地之表不有大天地者乎？
tls:text.tls:line: Besides, how do I know that beyond heaven and earth there is not a greater heaven and earth?

sense.def: auto-honorific ceremonial (by the decision of Qín Shǐhúang, used by emperors only)

tls:text.tls:line: and complained about it to God.

sense.def: accuse or malign (someone N1) in front of (someone else N2) 訴公於晉侯 "accuse the Duke in front of the Lord of Jìn"

tls:text.tls:line: God was afraid that they would drift to the far West

sense.def: sovereign; high deity

tls:text.tls:line: 'Four hundred thousand miles Eastward from the Middle Kingdom,

sense.def: in relation to

tls:text.tls:line: which they transported in hods and baskets to the tail of the Gulf of Qili

sense.def: with baskets, using baskets

tls:text.tls:line: live as equals,

sense.def: serve as ruler over the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: live as equals,

sense.def: serve as a subject to the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: whether they farm or trade,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:text.tls:line: whether they farm or trade,

sense.def: either... or; or perhaps

tls:text.tls:line: hunt or fish,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:text.tls:line: hunt or fish,

sense.def: either... or; or perhaps

tls:text.tls:line: When a first son is born

sense.def: eldest 長子 "eldest son"; most senior

tls:text.tls:line: 'When the sun first rises it is as big as the cover of a car;

sense.def: baldachin of a carriage; chariot canopy; umbrella

tls:text.tls:line: and both asked Pian Qiao to treat them.

sense.def: mythical doctor of antiquity, on whom there is a biography in SHIJI

tls:text.tls:line: 'Your ambitions is greater than your energy,'

sense.def: mythical doctor of antiquity, on whom there is a biography in SHIJI

tls:text.tls:line: Then Pian Qiao gave the two men drugged wine,

sense.def: mythical doctor of antiquity, on whom there is a biography in SHIJI

tls:text.tls:line: let me show you.'

sense.def: may I ask (for myself ) to V> please let me [short and idiomatic for 臣請]

tls:text.tls:line: looked at each other sadly with the tears dripping down their faces,

sense.def: tears (perhaps with an admixture of snivel)

tls:text.tls:line: 'Who is that man who has come with you?'

sense.def: be what kind of person? be who?

tls:text.tls:line: and always carried compass and square. (1)

sense.def: compass and square

tls:text.tls:line: and asked to become father and son.

sense.def: 子犯請擊之"Zǐfàn asked to attack them"ask permission (to do what what one would like to do); [The person whose permission is asked should also be in the structure as being always understood. There are quite a number of such cases. CH]

tls:text.tls:line: decision must come from within your breast

sense.def: seat of the mind, mind

tls:text.tls:line: but he was ashamed to depend on other men's strength,

sense.def: consider a disgrace, regard as shameful

tls:text.tls:line: "I wish you would advice me,"

sense.def: tears (perhaps with an admixture of snivel)

tls:text.tls:line: and struck him three times;

sense.def: strike, beat (e.g. a dog, a horse, one's breast, or indeed a bell)

tls:text.tls:line: and struck him three times;

sense.def: (so and so many) times (Note Hanshu 三下？)

tls:text.tls:line: that you should wish to compare yourself with me?'

sense.def: non-honorific?? me

tls:text.tls:line: 'I belong to the same generation as you,

sense.def: auto-honorific ceremonial (by the decision of Qín Shǐhúang, used by emperors only)

tls:text.tls:line: 'At home you complacently ignore me,

sense.def: my, the modification being marked by 之

tls:text.tls:line: in court you treat me with undisguised arrogance.

sense.def: my, the modification being marked by 之

tls:text.tls:line: On the road he met Master Dongguo,

sense.def: half, mid-

tls:text.tls:line: with such deep shame on your face?'

sense.def: filled with shame 甚愧之色

tls:text.tls:line: 'I am going to clear you of shame,'

sense.def: the feeling of shame (connected with an event N)

tls:text.tls:line: while he is ashamed although he has more worth.

sense.def: be ashamed of (oneself) 甚自愧

tls:text.tls:line: If you wish to win hegemony among the rulers of the states, or the Imperial throne itself,

sense.def: read bàwàng: become a hegemon

tls:text.tls:line: I preferred the disgrace of imprisonment;

sense.def: find personally shameful; find something personally, psychologically and morally unbearable and shameful, be embarrassed by

tls:text.tls:line: to whom should I hand over the state?

sense.def: whom

tls:text.tls:line: If he once hears that a man has made a mistake

sense.def: if only, as long as, when

tls:text.tls:line: If he once hears that a man has made a mistake

sense.def: as soon as

tls:text.tls:line: He is the sort of man

sense.def: natural disposition; personality, personal nature (not countable)趙歧2B6:孟子不悅其為人.

tls:text.tls:line: He is ashamed that he is not as good as the Yellow Emperor,

sense.def: be ashamed/embarrassed that S

tls:text.tls:line: shares his material possessions with others. //

sense.def: be a worthy

tls:text.tls:line: when it is not time to live and die.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:text.tls:line: They come to pass of themselves by the Way of Heaven. //

sense.def: 自己把自己oneself; on one's own initiative

tls:text.tls:line: Turns of itself by the Way of Heaven. //

sense.def: 自己把自己oneself; on one's own initiative

tls:text.tls:line: Being of themselves as they are //

sense.def: be so of and by itself; be naturally oneself; be natural; come naturally

tls:text.tls:line: Yang Zhu sang:

sense.def: to V as follows: S

tls:text.tls:line: in these cases life and death,

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:text.tls:line: good and harm, come of themselves.

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:text.tls:line: Some value life and live,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:text.tls:line: some scorn it and die,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:text.tls:line: some take care of the body and do it good,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:text.tls:line: some neglect it and do it harm.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:text.tls:line: To the end of their lives they never understood each other,

sense.def: use up, exhaust (the years of one's life etc)

tls:text.tls:line: He looked Northward down on the walls of his capital, and said with tears streaming:

sense.def: shed tears

tls:text.tls:line: should I ever leave it for another?

sense.def: depart from (somewhere), leave (something or somebody); run away from

tls:text.tls:line: should I ever leave it for another?

sense.def: here, this place (also non-referential: 有人於斯) idiom 於斯乎

tls:text.tls:line: Yet even we do not wish to die,

sense.def: emphatic: nonetheless

tls:text.tls:line: Yanzi alone was smiling to himself.

sense.def: smile to oneself

tls:text.tls:line: The Duke wiped away his tears, turned o Yanzi and said:

sense.def: tears (perhaps with an admixture of snivel)

tls:text.tls:line: why

sense.def: smile to oneself

tls:text.tls:line: and it is ignoble

sense.def: shed tears

tls:text.tls:line: and this sight

sense.def: 此三者

tls:text.tls:line: Yáng Zhū travelled in Lǔ,

sense.def: travel to, roam in

tls:text.tls:line: and lodged with Mr Meng.

sense.def: take temporary lodging (with somebody or in a certain place); (of army) encamp at

tls:text.tls:line: What use is reputation?"

sense.def: how? (i.e. in no way); for what? to what purpose? (with or without additional 何）

tls:text.tls:line: and if honest he will be poor.

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:text.tls:line: and if humble he will not rise in rank.

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:text.tls:line: infancy and senility

sense.def: youth

tls:text.tls:line: infancy and senility

sense.def: old age

tls:text.tls:line: take nearly half of it.

sense.def: nearly

tls:text.tls:line: take nearly half of it.

sense.def: be located in; occupy (a space, or a space of time, or a part)

tls:text.tls:line: take nearly half of it.

sense.def: a half 其半; half of them

tls:text.tls:line: What the night's sleep stops up

sense.def: sleep

seg.line: 晝覺之所遺，又幾居其半矣。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 晝覺之所遺，又幾居其半矣。
tls:text.tls:line: what during waking days is wasted also covers one half.

sense.def: waste, fritter away

tls:text.tls:srcline: 晝覺之所遺，又幾居其半矣。
tls:text.tls:line: what during waking days is wasted also covers one half.

sense.def: be located in; occupy (a space, or a space of time, or a part)

tls:text.tls:line: if we reckon how long we are at ease and content,

sense.def: be free and unhampered 逌然

tls:text.tls:line: if we reckon how long we are at ease and content,

sense.def: live up to one's hopes and aspirations (contrast 得己？)

tls:text.tls:line: Where is he to find happiness?

sense.def: feel deeply communictively happy with or in

tls:text.tls:line: In vain we lose the utmost enjoyment of the time of life,

sense.def: deep communicative happiness 熱鬧的快樂

tls:text.tls:line: In vain we lose the utmost enjoyment of the time of life,

sense.def: (degree noun:) (level of) delight/joy

tls:text.tls:line: and did not rebel against their spontaneous desires;

sense.def: naturally; all by itself, all of itself; unprovoked; effortlessly

tls:text.tls:line: "There is an old saying

sense.def: cataphoric: the following object, the object identified further down in the context

tls:text.tls:line: it is what I call "tending life".

sense.def: I, the writer of this text

tls:text.tls:line: I would not call it "tending life"."

sense.def: I, the writer of this text

tls:text.tls:line: or put me in a stone coffin dressed in a dragon-blazoned jacket and embroidered skirt.

sense.def: the ditches, gullies and waterways (into which dead bodies are thrown)

tls:text.tls:line: and for a hundred paces outside his door

sense.def: at a distance of N2 from N1

tls:text.tls:line: and stopped meeting and going out with his friends;

sense.def: associates; acquaintances

tls:text.tls:line: "I have heard, he said,

sense.def: and even; and thus also

tls:text.tls:line: that a man should influence his family by setting his own life in order, influence the state by setting his own family in order -

sense.def: and even; and thus also

tls:text.tls:line: meaning that the example you set to those nearest to you extends to those further away.

sense.def: this (aforementioned utterance, or quotation)

tls:text.tls:line: We in our turn like to dispute this issue with you.

sense.def: decide (a matter); pass judgment on (a case)

tls:text.tls:line: The things which all men desire to do,

sense.def: alive, live; living; occurring during one's lifetime

tls:text.tls:line: up in his hall and chambers

sense.def: porch; colonnade around a house

seg.line: 固未足以得此人之心也。」

tls:text.tls:srcline: 固未足以得此人之心也。」
tls:text.tls:line: naturally they are incapable of grasping what was in this man's mind.

sense.def: this (remarkable) person

tls:text.tls:line: may he hope by such means to live for ever?"

sense.def: wish to; hope for; prefer?? (ZHUANG)

tls:text.tls:line: "May he hope to prolong his life?"

sense.def: wish to; hope for; prefer?? (ZHUANG)

tls:text.tls:line: "May he hope to prolong his life?"

sense.def: for a long time; permanently; in the long run (often postposed); after a long time; in the long term

tls:text.tls:line: Why need you delay it or speed it on its way.

sense.def: Why? i.e. surely there is no reason! Mo: 吾言何遽不善？

tls:text.tls:line: The Great Yǔ did not keep even his body for his own benefit;

sense.def: profit (oneself)

tls:text.tls:line: if he could have benefited the Empire by the loss of one hair,

sense.def: benefit; be profitable for; provide for the good of; work for the profit of, be of benefit to

tls:text.tls:line: "But supposing it did help,

sense.def: supposing that

tls:text.tls:line: Mèngsūn Yáng continued:

sense.def: remain all silent

tls:text.tls:line: Mèngsūn Yáng continued:

sense.def: remain silent (not that this is not a state but an action to take), fall silent

tls:text.tls:line: Mèngsūn Yáng continued:

sense.def: for a while

tls:text.tls:line: and if I were to question the Great Yǔ and Mòzǐ about mine

sense.def: my; our (Zhou)

tls:text.tls:line: his four limbs did not find a moment's ease,

sense.def: limbs including the head; also: body parts generally 四體，五體，百體

tls:text.tls:line: When Yáo abdicated the throne to him,

sense.def: what has been abdicated from> the throne

tls:text.tls:line: Since his eldest son Shāngjūn was incompetent,

sense.def: have no particular talents; (by litotes:) be incompetent; be entirely devoid of ability, be devoid of talent

tls:text.tls:line: When Shùn abdicated the throne to him,

sense.def: what has been abdicated from> the throne

tls:text.tls:line: All those four sages

sense.def: NB: here the 者 is idiomatic with the adnominal number phrase.

tls:text.tls:line: were happy to the end of their lives,

sense.def: find communicative happiness; be communicatively happy (the optative cases have to be moved!)

tls:text.tls:line: hover in and out of sight.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:text.tls:line: we have seen some and heard of some,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

seg.line: 但伏羲已來三十餘萬歲，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 但伏羲已來三十餘萬歲，
tls:text.tls:line: but during the three hundred thousand years and more since Fúxī,

sense.def: since the time of N

tls:text.tls:line: "People find no rest

sense.def: alive, live; living; occurring during one's lifetime

tls:text.tls:line: He thinks it natural and normal

sense.def: at dawn

tls:text.tls:line: and he was very embarrassed.

sense.def: feel embarrassed 大慚

tls:text.tls:line: is an insatiable nature.

sense.def: insatiable

tls:text.tls:line: all it can do is endanger oneself.

sense.def: endanger (oneself)

tls:text.tls:line: all it can do is endanger oneself.

sense.def: contrastive: one's own person; oneself; himself

tls:text.tls:line: how can we treat it as a passing guest?

sense.def: How can one V?

tls:text.tls:line: judged it by the sayings of exemplary scholars and worthy men;

sense.def: the worthies (of a given time and/or place)

tls:text.tls:line: "Men, yet devoid of honour, //

sense.def: if (often indistinguishable from AND - relative clause) GY: 王而飾之

seg.line: 宋人有為其君以玉為楮葉者，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 宋人有為其君以玉為楮葉者，
tls:text.tls:line: There was a man of Song who made a mulberry leaf out of jade to give to his prince.

sense.def: the leading people of Npl

tls:text.tls:line: So the man's skill won him a regular salary from the government of Song.

sense.def: this (remarkable) person

tls:text.tls:line: may it not be thought that you are not a generous patron?'

sense.def: rhetorical question marker

tls:text.tls:line: his wife glared at him and beat her breast, saying:

sense.def: slap, tap; knock together

tls:text.tls:line: his wife glared at him and beat her breast, saying:

sense.def: chest

tls:text.tls:line: and presented himself as a teacher to the King of Qin.

sense.def: seek the aquaintance of, seek to meet

tls:text.tls:line: 'At present the princes of the sates are in violent contention,

sense.def: using （often: all one's) strength, powerfully, with one's power/strength; with all one's strength 力田 "work hard in agriculture"

seg.line: 孟氏之父子叩胸而讓施氏。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 孟氏之父子叩胸而讓施氏。
tls:text.tls:line: Mr Meng and his two sons beat thir breasts and cursed Mr Shi.

sense.def: knock at; strike against so as to make a sound

tls:text.tls:srcline: 孟氏之父子叩胸而讓施氏。
tls:text.tls:line: Mr Meng and his two sons beat thir breasts and cursed Mr Shi.

sense.def: breast, chest

tls:text.tls:srcline: 孟氏之父子叩胸而讓施氏。
tls:text.tls:line: Mr Meng and his two sons beat thir breasts and cursed Mr Shi.

sense.def: upbraid; reprove, criticise openly; reprimand publicly

tls:text.tls:line: Gongzi Chu looked up at the sky smiling.

sense.def: throw one's head back and V; throw one's head back and look at the sky

tls:text.tls:line: The Marquis was delighted

sense.def: be overjoyed; be absolutely delighted

tls:text.tls:line: Why should we need anyone else?'

sense.def: how? (i.e. in no way); for what? to what purpose? (with or without additional 何）

tls:text.tls:line: If the people have a sense of shame,

sense.def: characterised by a sense of shame

tls:text.tls:line: 'Bear in mind, my children.

sense.def: [my] disciple(s) (of a sage); the students [of Confucius]

tls:text.tls:line: 'Bear in mind, my children.

sense.def: keep in mind!

seg.line: 水且猶可以忠信誠身親之，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 水且猶可以忠信誠身親之，
tls:text.tls:line: By loyalty, truth and personal integrity we can make friends even with the water,

sense.def: even (stressed)

tls:text.tls:line: But only with men who know what is behind words.
The man who knows what is behind words
and sent a runner to report the victory.

sense.def: runner; urgent messenger GY

tls:text.tls:line: There was a family in Song which was unremitting

sense.def: the leading people of Npl

tls:text.tls:line: The father and son, being cripples,

sense.def: this (aforementioned) person

tls:text.tls:line: Bolo breathed a long sigh of wonder.

sense.def: sigh (as a sign of hightened emotion)

tls:text.tls:line: 'If your rank is high, others will envy you.

sense.def: be jealous of (erotically or politically) 妒功 妒而惡之

tls:text.tls:line: showed no sign of anxiety or regret.

sense.def: be happy

tls:text.tls:line: a wise man, isn't he?'

sense.def: ah! exclamatory particle expressing surprise, sometimes mixed with delight

tls:text.tls:line: The whole party agreed.

sense.def: express one's agreement (to something contextually determinate) [omission of that object idiomatically obligatory, it might seem, in Warring States Chinese]

tls:text.tls:line: 'What man are you?'

sense.def: be who?

tls:text.tls:line: I am a respectable man, I will not eat your food.'

sense.def: be in accordance with standards of rectitude; act in accordance with standards of rectitude

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the wise man is careful of what he lets go out.'

sense.def: abstractly: the man of talent and moral worth (at any time and in any place)

tls:text.tls:line: "Moral duty makes me kill my body for the sake of my reputaiton."

sense.def: have oneself killed; get killed as a result of one's own actions

tls:text.tls:line: but you can see how far the tips of the branches had diverged.

sense.def: be one and the same
(always with understood and unexpressed subject:) what a pity!; how grievous!

tls:text.tls:line: Yang Bu, angry, was about to beat the dog.

sense.def: strike, beat (a dog etc); box

tls:text.tls:line: 'None of a man's cares is more urgent than death,

sense.def: be as urgent as

tls:text.tls:line: 'None of a man's cares is more urgent than death,

sense.def: death, also abstract: the fact of dying; mode of dying

tls:text.tls:line: when he heard that the man who could reveal it was dead

sense.def: pat (the back of a horse); touch (the elbow of a person etc)

tls:text.tls:line: when he heard that the man who could reveal it was dead

sense.def: chest

tls:text.tls:line: presented doves to Zhao Jianzi (Minister of Duke Ding (511-474 B.C.) of Jin.) on the New Year morning.

sense.def: turtledove; name of various kinds of birds

tls:text.tls:line: his talk,

sense.def: speech; way of talking
